title: Lost Huntress
description: My friend is missing. My ex-agent is a literal angel. And the ghost inside my head is getting antsy…And all I want to do is kill some monsters…But somebody somewhere has it out for me. I’ve been stripped of my monster hunting license, evicted from my apartment and forced to re-evaluate my life.But I didn’t come this far moping about!I’m a monster hunter. In full. And I’ll get to the bottom of this conspiracy against me. Even if it leads into the depths of the darkest corners of Hope City.My name is Kat Drummond, and I’m a monster hunter.Lost Huntress is the sixth book in the action-packed Kat Drummond Series, a thrilling urban fantasy series set in a post-apocalyptic magical version of our world. Continue the saga with this book today!
author: Nicholas Woode-Smith
